data.name: RPG Maker MV - Medieval: Warfare
data.detailed_description:
War is coming; hone your blades, raise your banner, fasten your armour, and sound the horns of battle!

Everything you need is inside to create literally thousands of unique characters including their spritesheets (with over 50 animations supported!), facesets, busts, and paper-dolls. On top of that, there are an absolute ton of tiles included for you to build the world you want to create. Each Medieval pack builds on the others, offering nearly countless combinations of characters and giving an ever-expanding vast library of tiles and other resources to build your dream game.

Features:
  • 11 Tile sheets for warfare carnage, rubble, desolated environments, and battle encampments (both inside and out!)
  • 60 pre-made and piles of rubble to build destroyed settlements and sacked villages.
  • Nearly 70 additional pieces for siege equipment, ditches/moats, guard towers and more!
  • Each character template and piece of equipment/clothing/etc comes with the resources to create over 50 different spritesheets ranging from walking, running, sleeping, sitting, side-view combat, down poses, idling, and much more – all in 4 and 8 directions! On top of that, each comes with the resources to make busts, paperdolls, and facesets!
  • 6 unique character templates with nearly 140 pieces of clothing, hair styles, equipment, and more to allow you to create literally thousands of unique characters (fully compatible with other templates and clothing/hair/accessories from other Medieval packs).
  • 14 Pre-made characters utilizing the resources within are included.
  • Separated shadows for all character templates.
  • 6 Animated object spritesheets for lightsources and more.
  • Revised Read-Me and Instruction document.

data.short_description: War is coming; hone your blades, raise your banner, fasten your armour, and sound the horns of battle!Everything you need is inside to create literally thousands of unique characters including their spritesheets (with over 50 animations supported!), facesets, busts, and paper-dolls.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Medieval: Warfare
